summary: Twisters is a 2024 disaster movie directed by Lee Isaac Chung. It's a sequel to the 1996 film Twister and stars Daisy Edgar-Jones, Glen Powell, and Anthony Ramos as storm chasers in Oklahoma. The movie was made after talks of a sequel began in 2020, and it was directed by Chung after several other directors were considered. It premiered in London in July 2024 and was released worldwide soon after, receiving positive reviews and making $371 million.
title: Twisters (film)
